title: loss sudden increase from 0.2 to 40, and preview goes black
body:
## Expected behavior Traning goes fine. ## Actual behavior ![1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48871944/54873935-35ca1e00-4e1c-11e9-9cdd-106ff63c63a3.jpg) Before 61410, training goes fine without any problem. But after that, AI preview goes black, source image preview still showing through. There are 5 columns in preview window, column 1,3 are showing, column 2, 4, 5 are completely black. [02:43:23][#061370][4251ms] src_loss:0.286 dst_loss:0.137 [02:44:03][#061380][4196ms] src_loss:0.211 dst_loss:0.101 [02:44:43][#061390][3925ms] src_loss:0.221 dst_loss:0.176 [02:45:33][#061400][4071ms] src_loss:0.228 dst_loss:0.171 [02:46:27][#061410][4233ms] src_loss:18.271 dst_loss:40.176 [02:47:02][#061420][4122ms] src_loss:19.5572 dst_loss:40.248 [02:47:51][#061430][4235ms] src_loss:17.217 dst_loss:39.314 [02:48:37][#061440][4295ms] src_loss:18.575 dst_loss:40.589 ![66](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48871944/54874013-de2cb200-4e1d-11e9-91f6-cc5f8b481261.jpg) And this grapth become completely black after 61410 ## Steps to reproduce Not yet ## Other relevant information - **Command lined used (if not specified in steps to reproduce)**: `$DFL_PYTHON "$DFL_SRC/main.py" train \ --training-data-src-dir "$DFL_WORKSPACE/data_src/aligned" \ --training-data-dst-dir "$DFL_WORKSPACE/data_dst/aligned" \ --model-dir "$DFL_WORKSPACE/model" \ --model SAE` - Operating system and version:Ubuntu 16.04 - Python version:3.6.8 
Loading model...
Press enter in 2 seconds to override model settings.Using TensorFlow backend.
